      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_e970b66a3017148fa43ff473a506adbb5a014600</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Weight of floating metal and wood</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewicht sich hin- und herbewegendes Metall und 
Holz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poids de métal et de bois flottants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Peso do metal e da madeira flutuando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Peso di metallo e di legno di galleggiante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάρος του επιπλεόντων μετάλλου και του ξύλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Peso de metal y de madera flotantes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the weights of a metal block and wooden block when they are afloat in water and when they are not.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal block</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wooden block</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die Gewichte eines 
Metalblockes und hölzerner Block, wenn sie flott im Wasser sind und 
wenn sie nicht sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare les poids d'un bloc en
métal et bloc en bois quand elles sont à flot dans l'eau et quand 
elles ne sont pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração comparam os pesos de um bloco 
do metal e o bloco de madeira quando está afloat na água e quando 
não é.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta i pesi di un 
blocchetto del metallo ed il blocco di legno quando sono a galla in 
acqua e quando non sono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει τα βάρη μιας ομάδας 
δεδομένων μετάλλων και της ξύλινης ομάδας δεδομένων όταν είναι 
επιπλέοντες στο ύδωρ και όταν δεν είναι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara los pesos de un bloque 
del metal y el bloque de madera cuando están a flote en agua y cuando
no son.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metalblock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hölzerner Block</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bloc en métal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bloc en bois</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bloco do metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">peso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bloco de madeira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">blocchetto del metallo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">peso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ομάδα δεδομένων μετάλλων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βάρος</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
